underlying_goal: Fix a Spring Boot application startup error caused by AWS Bedrock credentials/authorization issue
friction_detail: Initial AWS config fix (adding sso_session to bedrock profile) did not resolve the issue; the app still used the wrong credentials after the change, and Claude also incorrectly proposed changing the region before user caught it.
brief_summary: User needed to fix an AWS Bedrock AccessDeniedException in their Spring Boot app; Claude correctly identified the root cause (wrong AWS profile being used) but the config fix alone didn't resolve it, and the session ended mid-investigation with a commit.
